com.mapbox.services.api

Class MapboxService<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.api.MapboxService<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type parameter.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapboxDirections, MapboxDistance, MapboxGeocoding, MapboxMapMatching

    public abstract class MapboxService<T>
extends Object
    Mapbox specific services used internally within the SDK.

    1.0.0
